attributes.title: No of ur business😹
attributes.review: This is app is the worst thing I’ve ever seen!!! I can’t comprehend what it does or what I can do with it. When u first opened the app I literally went into anaphylactic shook and I then passed out. I have a few tips also , if he wants a natural looking tan he can get this really good tanning lotion that works miracles😻 it is called Maui babe tanning lotion. Girls supporting girls ya know! The app is so glitchy and give me a headache!!!

attributes.title: 🤬meanie hot Cheeto
attributes.review: This app will snatch your weave and your mom 😡🤬 I can’t even begin to explain how terrible my experience on this app was I was just trying to support the Cheeto man while walking my pet fish and little did I know that by the time I got back i would find my stuffed pet rat victor on the floor dead SHOT by the man with the yellow wig himself DO NOT GET THIS APP SAVE A RATS LIFE 😤he’s coming for all our weaves this app will give you flees 😫🤬😱😰

attributes.title: This app is as distasteful as trumps face
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app to my phone, I went into cardiac arrest. Many would say this is coincidental, but I know for a fact that this occurred because of the disgust that I associate with trump. Not only is this app a threat to my personal safety, I believe it has likely had similar effects on countless other users. In simpler words, this app is a threat to America and MUST BE BANNED!

This app started out by explaining to me how any organization advocating for BLM is communist and wants to destroy the USA. Then it tried to convince me that fascism is good, and we should delete social media platforms that we disagree with or we feel have exercised too much free speech. I tried to delete it, but it told me that my phone belonged to it now and if I don’t like it I should get a different phone.

attributes.title: gave me ptsd
attributes.review: i don’t know if i can even describe what i just witnessed. i can’t sleep because of what i saw on this app. whenever i occasionally doze off... i just see HIS face. it’s terrible. i’ve been going to biweekly therapy sessions because of this horrible application. whenever i see the word “trump” i get war flashbacks to when i downloaded this. it makes me pee myself. i DON’T RECOMMEND.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE AND UNRELIABLE
attributes.review: They kept spamming emails and threatened to eat MY CHILDREN my 3 year old and 11 year old are scared they fear this orange Cheeto every day they even threatened to step on my grandma and trample her with a wagon they also stated that they would take away her dentures and drink the cheese water they also suddenly got my sisters number they threatened to beat their meat 😔😫 we don’t support animal abuse or beating anything that has feelings

attributes.title: this app is brainwashing people
attributes.review: this app is from china. and... wait for it... they are stealing your information🤡 the chinese are spying on you and the communists are coming for you!! HIDE😱 it’s their fault that the corona virus exists they need to be punished😡 the children have become addicted to this app they are on it ALL THE TIME💩 this app is brainwashing them into being a trump supporter!! we must ban it in the united states for national security!!!!!

attributes.title: I’m scared for life...
attributes.review: I never really looked into the app much because Trump is a horrible person and if you look once at his duck/orange/monster looking face it WILL make you want to throw up🤢But about the app, let’s start by just saying ....just no do not get this app it will ruin you! Ok bye I will go throw up now and delete this ratchet app. I don’t even know why I got it in the first place. 😩

attributes.title: Something’s wrong...
attributes.review: I was under the impression this app would show me hot patriotic singles in my area and so I set my age range according but all I see when I open it is an ugly old man? What gives? I am extremely disappointed considering not only was he the only option presented but I’ve come to find out he’s already taken! Pls fix these issues soon :(

attributes.title: Absolute horrible huuuuge waste of time
attributes.review: I wish I was able to give 0 stars because this app was absolutely horrible it crashed after 10 seconds of using it and it gave my phone about 20 different foreign viruses and now I have to get a new phone. This is the worst app in history and needs to be taken down immediately!
